text: Following is a table of United States presidential elections in California. Since statehood in 1850, California has participated in every U.S. presidential election. From 1852 through 1976 California was a swing state with many close presidential elections. California is now among the most Democratic (blue) states. "" indicates the national winner, while "" indicates national losers. {| class="sortable wikitable" |- valign=bottom ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Year ! scope="col" colspan="4" | Winner (state election) !
